set-payload.value:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json
var whereCase = if(!isEmpty(payload)) " WHERE " else ""
var studentId = if(!isEmpty(payload.student_id)) " student_id='" ++ payload.student_id ++ "'" else "" var firstName = if(!isEmpty(payload.first_name)) " first_name='" ++ payload.first_name ++ "'" else "" var lastName = if(!isEmpty(payload.last_name)) " last_name='" ++ payload.last_name ++ "'" else "" var schoolName = if(!isEmpty(payload.school_name)) " school_name='" ++ payload.school_name ++ "'" else "" var emailId = if(!isEmpty(payload.email_id)) " email_id='" ++ payload.email_id ++ "'" else "" var trainerId = if(!isEmpty(payload.trainer_id)) " trainer_id='" ++ payload.trainer_id ++ "'" else "" var enrollDate = if(!isEmpty(payload.enrollment_date)) " enrollment_date='" ++ payload.enrollment_date ++ "'" else "" var status = if(!isEmpty(payload.status)) " status='" ++ payload.status ++ "'" else "" var courseId = if(!isEmpty(payload.course_id)) " course_id='" ++ payload.course_id ++ "'" else ""
--- "SELECT * FROM student_details" ++ whereCase ++ (trim(studentId ++ firstName ++ lastName ++ schoolName ++ emailId ++ trainerId ++ enrollDate ++ status ++ courseId) replace " " with " AND ")]
set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map{ studentId: $.student_id, firstName: $.first_name, lastName: $.last_name, emailId: $.email_id, schoolName: $.school_name, trainerId: $.trainer_id, enrollmentDate: $.enrollment_date, status: $.status, courseId: $.course_id }
